name: A Finishing Bow
description:
My Submission to the 2019 Yogscast Game Jam. Special Thanks to Cat Face for helping create the art for this game!

In this game you play as Elves who are battling to wrap presents to earn Employee of the year in Santa's Workshop, only problem is, there is a shortage of wrapping paper... and in the north pole, the only place to find wrapping paper... is inside elves...

So use those gifts you wrapped on you and your enemies to feed the endless cycle of presents

(Preface, Elves are immortal, in the wise words of the Black Knight "Tis but a Scratch" you always re-spawn)

In other words, Kill, Collect Wrapping Paper, Wrap Gifts, Use Gifts to Kill, Repeat, Profit!

How to Play:

The aim of the Game is to wrap the most presents, Interact with a gun on the ground to pick it up, once you kill a enemy, you will gain a wrapping paper along with any wrapping papers they had on their person, interact next to your house to cash in the wrapping paper and wrap some gifts.

there is a continuous timer of five minutes, once that runs out you will see who wins and get the choice to restart.

Menu:

When your on the Menu press any button on any controller to join the game, once you have a minimum of 2 players use your mouse to click on start (to play as the Keyboard you need to press a key on the keyboard)

Controls:

Keyboard:

Interact - Right Click

Fire Gun - Left Click

Movement - WASD

Aim Gun - Mouse

Gamepad:

Interact - Left Trigger/Left Shoulder Button

Fire Gun - Right Trigger/Right Shoulder Button

Movement - Right Thumbstick

Aim Gun - Left Thumbstick

Note, as this Game was made in 48 hours, I was unable to complete everything I wanted to do, such as sounds/music, a Logo, some more weapons, and a more interesting Menu. I am continuing to work on this game and a Post Jam version will be out soon.
